title: Paradise [RUS] [ND]
description:
Paradise [RUS] [ND]

Russian license version from "Novyj Disk" company

Protection: StarForce

System requirements: Windows 2000/XP, Pentium III 800 MHz, 256 MB RAM, 64 MB video card, sound card, 8x DVD-ROM, 2.5 GB hard drive space


Play Instructions:

    * Install the game.
    * Apply the official Paradise v1.1.3 rus Patch.
    * Replace the original STARTUP.EXE file with the one from /NoDVD.
    * Play the Game!
